eventlist:
<https://flatisjustice.moe/eventlist>
General: Enter ship levels/export to kanmusu list -> Copy the code in the box at top (starts with `.2|`) -> Paste in text box on site linked above -> Press enter/select wanted image
For KC3: Strategy room -> Ship list -> Click on `Export to: kanmusu_list` at bottom of filter box -> See general
For EO: Right click fleet name in fleet panel -> Click on `Copy Ship List (kancolle-calc)` -> See general
cache:
KCCacheProxy: <https://github.com/Tibowl/KCCacheProxy/releases/>
Full cache dumps (optional): <https://mega.nz/#F!sOwClABa!yHldyYZr2MBqhTNYEupztg>

Installation (v2 or later, windows): Get latest setup exe from releases, open it, set browser/viewer proxy to `localhost:8081` (see <https://github.com/Tibowl/KCCacheProxy/blob/master/ReadMe.md#browserviewer-setup> for more information).
Using full cache dumps: Download the most recent zip from the MEGA linked above, extract zip somewhere, set path to where you extracted in UI and click on the `Save` button.
Upgrading to v2 from v1.x: Delete any auto-startup things, install v2 like usual (see above), set cache path to old cache folder (don't forget to save, can be moved first if wanted). Other files from old version can be deleted.
